channel.title: Recoloring items?

item.title: Recoloring items?
item.dc:creator: @X_Ownage X Ownage
item.description:
@X_Ownage wrote:

if(i == 9002)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//dont need to change
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;//equip type
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];//NUMBER OF ORIGINAL COLORS
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//NUMBER OF CHANGED COLORS
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;//ORIGINAL COLOR
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;//CHANGED COLOR
class8.anInt174 = 9631;
class8.anInt181 = 440;
class8.anInt190 = 76;
class8.anInt198 = 1850;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 1;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 187;
class8.anInt200 = 363;
class8.anInt175 = 29;
class8.anInt197 = 87;
class8.aString170 = “Legends Cape”;//ITEM NAME
class8.aByteArray178 = “True legends wear this.”.getBytes();//ITEM DESCRIPTION (EXAMINE INFO)
}

item.title: Recoloring items?
item.dc:creator: @X_Ownage X Ownage
item.description:
@X_Ownage wrote:

Try this,

if(i == 9002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//dont need to change class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//equip type class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];//NUMBER OF ORIGINAL COLORS class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//NUMBER OF CHANGED COLORS class8.anIntArray156[0] = 1;//ORIGINAL COLOR class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924;//CHANGED COLOR class8.anInt174 = 1052; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Legends Cape";//ITEM NAME class8.aByteArray178 = "True legends wear this.".getBytes();//ITEM DESCRIPTION (EXAMINE INFO) }

item.title: Recoloring items?
item.dc:creator: @Pimpshizzle Pimpshizzle
item.description:
@Pimpshizzle wrote:

i want to turn the legends cape to look like fire cape >.<

if(i == 9002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//dont need to change class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//equip type class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];//NUMBER OF ORIGINAL COLORS class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];//NUMBER OF CHANGED COLORS class8.anIntArray156[0] = 1;//ORIGINAL COLOR class8.anIntArray160[0] = 40;//CHANGED COLOR class8.anInt174 = 1052; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt190 = 76; class8.anInt198 = 1850; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 187; class8.anInt200 = 363; class8.anInt175 = 29; class8.anInt197 = 87; class8.aString170 = "Legends Cape";//ITEM NAME class8.aByteArray178 = "True legends wear this.".getBytes();//ITEM DESCRIPTION (EXAMINE INFO) }
